channel.title: Model colouring (help)
channel.description:
hey
well im pretty new to models and im still learning and recently i tried to recolour all the elegant sets like r.s and well if im completly honest, i suck at it :( it was a major failure :(, so i wont try modeling again lol i brutaly mudered it :(
any one out there know of any released elegant colours apart from black? or a tutorial that will help me?
thanks to any one who can help :)
gary
